Description:
Just right.
Located in a quiet court in the much sort after Cloverdale Estate, this meticulously presented 3 bedroom brick veneer home is ready for you to move straight in and enjoy! Ideal for first home buyers or investors looking for a neat, well cared for property in a desirable location. With a charming facade and practical floor plan the home offers a spacious open planned living & dining area complete with large kitchen featuring breakfast bar and views of the rear yard. All 3 bedrooms contain BIR's and are serviced by the central bathroom while the master suit comes complete with own ensuite. A single lock up garage offers additional security and peace of mind while also provides drive-through access via a roller door at the rear to the backyard. The well maintained north facing backyard enables ample space for the whole family to enjoy including clothesline and garden shed all situated on a 530m2 (approx.) allotment. Off the main roads, but handy to schools, Corio Shopping Centre, transport and sitting amongst a well-established neighbourhood with excellent access to the Ring Road, a property such as this with so much to offer at such an affordable price will not stay on the market long, call and inspect today.
Insights: 15 Caramut Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Invest with the Best!
In the heart of Corio lies this neat 3 bedroom brick veneer home located on approx. 542m2 of land, perfect for first home buyers & investors alike! The property comprises of 3 comfortable bedrooms, a spacious lounge, practical kitchen/meals area & a central bathroom with separate w/c. A large rear yard with single car garage & additional bungalow complete this charming property. The home boasts easy access to all amenities including Corio Shopping Centre, public transport, schools for all ages & is just minutes from the Princes Highway and Ring Road for commuters. With all the opportunities this home has to offer, make no mistake at this price it will not last! The property offers fantastic value for any astute investor looking to extend their portfolio or owner occupier

Description:
Entertainers dream - Immaculate inside & out!
If you're looking for a spacious & renovated 3 bedroom home, this is just the place to provide you with a comfortable and convenient lifestyle. Perfectly suited for families, investors and first home buyers alike this charming property has something for all. Upon entry you are greeted by a large lounge with access to the spacious kitchen/dining area providing gas cooking and views of the backyard. The well-presented home contains three bedrooms in total all with BIR's as well as a gleaming central bathroom with separate shower and bath. Absolutely immaculately presented the home has recently been fully painted inside and has brand new carpet laid throughout. You will be amazed by the extensive outdoor entertaining area with a large pergola that wraps all the way around the driveway and the rear of the home. Also outside lies a single car garage, room for additional undercover parking and a beautiful open grass area perfect for the whole family to enjoy. Only minutes' walk to the Corio shopping Centre, this stunning home provides easy access to all major amenities & is situated just a short stroll to medical facilities & child care centres which are located down the road. Quality homes such as this are rare to find, inspections are a must to truly appreciate the amazing interior renovation and manicured exterior that this property has to offer. Current estimated rental return of $300-$320 pw.
Insights: 11 McKinley Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Value & Space in Convenient Location
It will almost be impossible to find a better value proposition, with so much space for people and toys in a convenient location. Each bedroom is generous while the master features an en suite and walk-in-robe, the lounge includes floating timer floors while the practical kitchen flows to the dining space and extends out to the covered entertainment area that will accommodate all guests. Light filled, with a central bathroom and perfect for year round comfort with R/C A/C and gas heater. Sitting on 638 sqm allotment with a double carport and double garage. Handy to Corio Central Shopping Centre, transport, schools and providing excellent access to the Ring Road. Offered at such exceptional value you will need to act quick to make it your own.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Stylish Living! Or Smart Investment - YOU Choose
Positioned amongst other quality homes in the popular Rose Park Estate, this wonderful 4 bedroom home, with 2 living areas would make an ideal investment, perfect first home or down sizer! The moment you enter this beautiful 4 bedroom property you will feel right at home. Perfect for the entire family to move right in & sit right down without having to change a thing.
If entertaining is something the family loves to do, then this home is for you, offering ample living space with quality finishes throughout. Upon entry you are complemented with the first of 2 stylish living zones which then walks through to the large functional kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher.
The generous bedrooms feature built in robes while the master bedroom contains walk in robe and neat ensuite. The central bathroom offers a beautiful stand free bath and separate shower.
Outside an impressive sheltered alfresco entertaining area is ideal for hosting year round parties while the rest of the yard is extremely low maintenance. Built on a great size 612sqm block (approx.) the wonderful design and space of this home are second to none and will impress instantly.
With easy access to the Geelong Ring Road this is perfect for commuters. As well as living close by to Corio Village Shopping Centre, medical facilities, public transport & schools it makes family living a breeze.
Insights: 14 Juniper Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2011 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Ready-to-go, 3 bedroom home in a prime position.
This 3 bedrooom well looked after family home situated on 562m2 approx. allotment will surely not disappoint. The light filled lounge/dining area with gas heating provides you with beautiful, glimmering tiled floors and access to the rear yard and kitchen area. The spacious kitchen provides gas cooking and does not lack any cupboard space, with an additional walk-in pantry. All 3 bedrooms are carpeted and astonishingly provide plenty of space whilst all being accompanied by BIR's. The central bathroom with separate toilet shines with refinement and along side lays the very expansive laundry that features side access to the very vibrant and tidy rear yard. Situated in a very prestigious part of Corio, you are privileged with a 5min drive to both the Corio Shopping Centre and access to the Melbourne Ring Road. Being in a safe, quiet neighbourhood, with schools at easy reach and great tenants, any first-home buyer or investor wouldn't dare to pass on this opportunity.

Description:
The Ideal Starter
Situated in a neat block of units, back from the street, this low maintenance unit is ideal for the commuter with easy access to the highway, under an hour from Melbourne & just 15 mins from Geelongs CBD. Public transport is only 350 metres away with bus stops going in both directions, also walking distance to Corio Central Shopping Centre.
- Spacious bedroom with BIR
- Open plan kitchen/living/dining with A/C
- Combined bathroom and laundry with separate toilet
- Single carport with lock up storage space at the rear
- Neat and tidy back yard
- Potential rental return of $180 p/w
Dont miss out, at this price, it wont last!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Charismatic, 3 bedroom, brick home!
Any first home buyer with a keen eye for future potential or investor looking to get a spectacular rental property wouldn't dare let this opportunity go by. Sitting on a 541m2 allotment, this 3 bedroom, brick veneer home is bursting with character and demonstrates decades of loving care. The spacious living room with gas heating provides plenty of natural light and access through to the neat kitchen/meals area with gas cooking. The central passageway flows through to the gleaming bathroom providing an over-sized shower, and all 3 carpeted bedrooms that offer plenty of space, one of which has BIR's and another with access to the beautiful rear yard. Outside comprises of a pergola, plenty of open space & greenery. This pristine family home is 5 minutes walk to schools, couple of minutes drive to Corio Shopping Centre, 5 minutes drive to the Geelong Ring Road all situated in a Residential Growth Zone. Don't wait until the weekend... book an inspection today!

Description:
Family Home or Perfect Investment!
This 4 bedroom brick home will attract families and investors alike. Conveniently situated near the Ring Road and within minutes of Northern Bay College, Stead Park, medical centres and shops, it offers great development or investment potential (STCA). Its interior combines original and modern touches, with a wooden kitchen enhanced by dishwasher and stainless steel appliances. A covered carport and single lock up garage provide off-street parking, while a secure backyard ensures comfort and privacy.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Fantastic Family Living!
From the moment you open the front door to this updated brick veneer home, you will be welcomed with character & charm. Situated in a quiet court location in the desirable Cloverdale Estate this stunning property situated on approx. 710sqm, will tick all the boxes for any growing family, first home buyer or potential downsizer. The home consists of 2 generous lounge areas - both featuring open fire places, a large kitchen at the center of the home providing island bench, views of the rear yard and dining area. With 3 bedrooms in total, the master contains WIR and 2-way-access to the main bathroom adjacent the separate laundry. Outside you'll be greeted by the well-established gardens, undercover alfresco area and single garage with additional W/C located inside. Additional features include - split system A/C, solar panels, stainless steel appliances and much more! Perfectly positioned in close proximity to the Ring Road, schools for all ages, reserves & just a short drive to Corio Shopping Centre what more could you want?

Description:
Home with Heart
Meticulously cared for and maintained so all you need is enjoy living or let out. This ex-government was originally well built, so add to that a recently renovated bathroom (with special needs access), updates in the kitchen , new carpets plus an air conditioner. Other features are the huge bedrooms, aluminium windows and covered entertainment area plus a large garage also suitable for entertaining. Solid & low maintenance, offering the best value for money and only short stroll to Corio Central Shopping Centre, schools, transport and easy access to the Ring Road making it ideal for those heading to the big smoke. When a home has been loved it shows, and this one won't last long.

Description:
Corner the market - 640m2 (approx). allotment.
Prime positioning directly opposite Corio Shopping Centre, take advantage of this incredible opportunity to purchase this 3 bedroom home sitting on a generous 640m2 parcel of land - Zoned Residential Growth Zone, Schedule 2! Situated on a corner allotment with an extensive rear yard this brick veneer home provides 3 ample sized bedrooms, a generous study/rumpus room, centrally located bathroom, separate laundry as well as a spacious front lounge with floor boards that opens up to the kitchen and meals area. An additional family room to the side of the homes allows access to the backyard which provides ample parking, 2 sheds for storage and more than enough room for the family to enjoy! If you're looking for a first home, an investor or renovator looking for a project that requires a little tender love and care but possesses the opportunity for fantastic financial growth then look no further! Located on the corner of Gellibrand Street & Bacchus Marsh Road all major amenities are located right on your doorstep. Directly opposite the Corio Shopping centre with schools for all ages located just a short stroll away & public transport easily accessible what more could you want?

This charming home is sure to tick all the boxes. This ready-to-move-into property is perfect for first home buyers or the astute investor. Situated on a wide service road, the property is located within close proximity to all major amenities including public transport, schools, the Corio Village shopping centre and features direct access to the highway for your Melbourne day trips.
This property offers:
• 3 generous sized bedrooms
• Spacious lounge with gas heating

Description:
Rent, reside or renovate!
Located in a prime position in Corio, this home is ideally located close to all major amenities, perfect for an investor with the keen eye for value or first home-buyers alike. If you want to break into the market, get here quick because this home is the best buying you will find anywhere. Situated on a 555m2 approx. allotment, this home comprises of a spacious light filled lounge with gas heating, 3 generous bedrooms with BIR's, kitchen complete with breakfast bench, gas cooking & dining alongside, gleaming central bathroom, laundry, single car garage, courtyard, second family room at the rear & sunroom providing access to the rear yard. Offering almost instant access to the Princes Highway to head straight to either the Melbourne or Geelong CBD and 5min drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, you won't need to venture very far for any necessities. The choice is yours to either rent, reside or renovate, just make sure you act with haste.

Description:
Investors, Watch Your Money Grow!
Investors take note! Don't lift a finger, sit back and watch you money grow when you invest in this solid 5 bedroom home in Corio already tenanted with the same reliable tenants for the past 4 years, this easy to maintain two storey home is the perfect addition to any portfolio.
Entering the home from the double carport you will be greeted by an inviting carpeted lounge with the polished timber stair case on your left and open study/work space. Stepping through you will walk into the tiled dining/kitchen area equipped with gas hotplates, electric wall oven, dishwasher, pantry, ample bench and cupboard space.
The huge master bedroom with built in robes opens out onto a private courtyard, perfect for any parent to sit back and relax. A second bedroom and bathroom are located close by. Upstairs are an additional three good sized bedrooms all carpeted with built in robes and a second bathroom and separate toilet.
Outside the home has shaded entertaining area for family BBQ's, a secure backyard with established gardens where kids and pets can safely play and an additional lock up colour bond garage. Extra features of this home include Air conditioning and plenty of extra storage.
Receiving $340 rental return a week with the tenants on a secure lease until May 2018, this is a fantastic investment where your retirement will reap the rewards.
Insights: 155 Princess Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 2 other 5 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
